price: 并将他们的房屋变成有金饰的。这些无非是今世生活的享受；在你的主那里的后世，是专归敬畏者的。
arabic: وَزُخۡرُفٗاۚ وَإِن كُلُّ ذَٰلِكَ لَمَّا مَتَٰعُ ٱلۡحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنۡيَاۚ وَٱلۡأٓخِرَةُ عِندَ رَبِّكَ لِلۡمُتَّقِينَ

version.title: Chinese Translation - Muhammad Makin
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Chinese by Muhammad Makin. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wazukh'rufan wa-in kullu dhālika lammā matāʿu al-ḥayati al-dun'yā wal-ākhiratu ʿinda rabbika lil'muttaqīna
